fullText:
Precise Hunter

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Wis 15, ranger, Hunter’s Quarry class feature
Benefit: When you score a critical hit against the target of your Hunter’s Quarry with a ranged attack, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that target until the start of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 199.
name: Precise Hunter
